tool.name: qiime2 diversity alpha-group-significance

param.name: alpha_diversity
param.label: alpha_diversity: SampleData[AlphaDiversity]
param.help: [required] Vector of alpha diversity values by sample.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: diversity alpha-group-significance =========================================== Alpha diversity comparisons
Outputs: -------- :visualization.qzv: <no description>
|
Description: ------------ Visually and statistically compare groups of alpha diversity values.
|
